#read in data
```{r}
library(reshape2)
library(nnet)
# Read in synthetic data
syntheticdata <- read.csv("~/data/MIMIC/MIMIC_synthetic/large_batch_2018_06_19/mimic_synthetic.csv")
admissions<-read.csv("~/data/MIMIC/MIMIC_RAW_CSV/ADMISSIONS.csv")
patients<-read.csv("~/data/MIMIC/MIMIC_RAW_CSV/PATIENTS.csv")
admissions <- admissions[complete.cases(admissions),]
patients <- patients[complete.cases(patients),]
icu_stay <- read.csv("~/data/MIMIC/MIMIC_RAW_CSV/ICUSTAYS.csv")
icu_stay <- icu_stay[complete.cases(icu_stay), ]
dnr <- read.csv("~/data/MIMIC/MIMIC_RAW_CSV/DNR_computed.csv")
dnr <- dnr[complete.cases(dnr), ]
```
